name: 023_gatehouse_give_biscuit_no_sword
description: in the gatehose; give the biscuit but don't get the sword
expected_full_outputs:
Unlocked

Openned. 

Your score is now 10 out of 75

*** Gatehouse ***

You are in the Gatehouse. This sparse but serviceable room guards the entrance to the main castle. Once upon a time it no-doubt bristled with alert guards bearing gleaming arms. Today, it is filled with old furniture, cobwebs, and a musty smell. Dim light filters in from the arrow slits facing the moat while the shadows at the north end of the room hint at the darkness of the main castle beyond.

Upon the wall hangs a Shiny Sword of great antinquity. 

There is a Front Gate to the south and a Foreboding Archway to the north.

There is a Wooden Shelf here. The Wooden Shelf is empty. 

The Royal Hedgehog is here. The Royal Hedgehog is wearing: a Red Bandana.

Openned. The Paper Bag contains: a Baked Biscuit. 

With a yelp of grateful delight the starving hedgehog leaps upon the Baked Biscuit and begins to devour them.

The Royal Hedgehog is ravenously devouring the Stale Biscuits and is taking no notice of you at all.

The hedgehog is eating ravenously.

The Royal Hedgehog is wearing: a Red Bandana.

The Royal Hedgehog has eaten through half the Stale Biscuits but is still giving them all of its attention.

This is an elven sword of great antiquity. The shiny sword glitters even in the dim light. Despite its age, the edge is keen and looks ready for action. There are elven runes engraved upon the blade.

On the Shiny Sword you see: Elven Runes. 

The Royal Hedgehog is nearly done eating all of the Stale Biscuits and is beginning to look around a bit.

The hedgehog is eating ravenously.

The Royal Hedgehog is wearing: a Red Bandana.

The Royal Hedgehog has finished the Stale Biscuits and is vigilantly looking around.

The Royal Hedgehog now looks considerably more bright-eyed and bushy-tailed.

The Royal Hedgehog is looking svelte and chipper. It has the swagger of a hedgehog that has just scored a meal of Stale Biscuits and still has it's favorite shiny possession.

The Royal Hedgehog is wearing: a Red Bandana.

I don't see a Biscuits here.

The Royal Hedgehog attacks with its Fierce Teeth and you attempt to dodge!

The moment you approach the Shiny Sword the territorial Royal Hedgehog springs forward, blocks your path, and bares it's Fierce Teeth.

You are startled and compelled to leap back in surprise.
